title: Daily Downward Longwave Irradiance - GOES
summary: Estimation of the Downward Longwave Irradiance reaching the Earth surface, derived from the geostationary satellite GOES-E, produced by remapping over a 0.05° regular grid and expressed in W/m2. Algorithm is a bulk parameterization that uses NWP model outputs to calculate a clear sky Downward Longwave Irradiance (DLI), corrected according to satellite derived cloud information. The daily value is the integration of all the hourly values in the UT day.
